sellerCard.oneLiner: Your creative design partner in this ever changing digital world
sellerCard.description:
Hey, future partner!

We are Shiftr, a creative design agency that brings your ideas to life through product design, web and mobile apps, branding, and software development.

We’re a team of passionate professionals who connect technology with human emotion to create experiences that are simple, memorable, and impactful. From the very first concept to the final product, we keep the user at the heart of everything we do.

Let’s turn your vision into something unforgettable. Ready to make it happen? Let’s chat!

description.content:
Craft Your Unique Dropshipping Ecommerce Business W E B S I T E! CONTACT US before you order and we'll send you a Custom one.


Hello! I'm Val, and I lead a small studio that tailors figma powered websites to help businesses reach their goals. Our approach focuses on understanding your business and customers to create a compelling design that effectively communicates your message. We design Ecommerce websites with conversion in mind.


OUR STATS: After redesign the websites have 2.8x more conversion because of our deep expertise in sales u marketing funnels.


What WE Offer and Our Process:


  1. Wireframing and Prototyping: Perfecting your website blueprint.
  2. Competitor Research: Identifying your unique value proposition.
  3. Understanding Your Goals: Delving into your business objectives and user challenges for an intuitive experience.
  4. Sleek User Interfaces: Designing trendy, visually appealing interfaces with stunning motion graphics.
  5. WordPress/WooCommerce or Shopify Development

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is the process for creating a UI/UX design for a dropshipping website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Dropshipping website design process typically involves research market and users, define goals, develop personas, plan site structure, create wireframes and prototypes, design visuals, test with users, optimize for mobile, collaborate with developers, and iterate for improvements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How can a website's design influence user trust and credibility?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: A well-designed website's design can influence user trust and credibility through factors such as professional visual design, clear messaging and calls to action, and transparent privacy and security policies, which can lead to increased engagement and conversions.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How can responsive design improve a website's usability?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Responsive design is a design approach that allows a website to adapt to different screen sizes and devices, such as smartphones and tablets. By using responsive design, a website can ensure that it is easy to use and navigate on any device, improving its overall usability and user experience.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What are some current trends in website design?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Some current trends in website design include the use of bold typography, vibrant colour schemes, asymmetrical layouts, minimalism, and the use of illustrations and animations. However, it's important to note that trends should be used judiciously and only if they align with the website's goals.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you build Shopify websites?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, we build websites on WordPress only.

reviews.comment:
Val exceeded all expectations with their outstanding work in website design and WordPress engineering. From the onset, Val demonstrated a keen eye for design, effortlessly blending aesthetics with functionality. The website they created is not only visually stunning but also user-friendly, showcasing a seamless integration of modern design principles and technical proficiency. Their expertise in WordPress was particularly impressive, as they skillfully customized themes and plugins to meet specific needs, ensuring that the site was not only beautiful but also powerful and efficient.

Moreover, Val's professionalism and communication skills were exemplary. Throughout the pro

Custom website took a lot of work and development and very happy with the design. Finalizing a few final design features and we will be good to go!

Thanks for your help!

I had an excellent experience with Val. He answered every request quickly and with a smile that I could read through the words he wrote. Not only did he provide a great design and very valuable insight and feedback about my old design, but he also offered outstanding ideas and a curated selection of images that truly brought my project to life. The creativity and eye for detail exceeded my expectations, making the process smooth and enjoyable. The final product was not just a website, but a masterpiece that perfectly represents my vision. Highly recommended for anyone in need of top-notch design services!

seller_response.comment: It was a pleasure working with Felix, clear communication, collaborative spirit, and commitment to the project made the entire experience enjoyable and productive. Looking forward to working together in the future as well. Thank you.

reviews.comment: Fantastic service and communication, very high quality work at fair prices!.

seller_response.comment: Working with Irving was a delight. A highly professional client with clear requirements. Look forward to working together again. Thanks!

reviews.comment: Val's ability to communicate effectively and his willingness to understand our unique requirements were truly commendable. He delivered modern and innovative solutions that precisely catered to our needs. Without a doubt, we will be collaborating with Val again in the future.

seller_response.comment: Working with Simon is always a pleasure, great buyer. Thanks
